title: User Authentication and Access Management
summary: Implement secure login system with multi-factor authentication and role-based access control.
description: Develop a secure authentication module allowing customers to log in using multi-factor authentication methods. Implement role-based access controls ensuring customers can only access services and data authorized to their profiles. Integrate with existing identity management systems and enforce strong password policies, session management, and secure token handling.

title: Responsive User Interface and Experience Design
summary: Create a responsive, user-friendly portal interface accessible across all devices.
description: Design and develop a modern, responsive user interface for the self-service portal. Ensure accessibility across desktop, tablet, and mobile devices, maintaining a consistent and intuitive user experience. Focus on ease of navigation, minimal clicks for common workflows, and visually engaging elements that support customer self-service.

title: Customer Dashboard and Personalization
summary: Build personalized dashboards showing relevant banking products and services.
description: Develop a dynamic dashboard that displays account information, eligible banking services, and personalized offers based on customer profile data. Ensure data is pulled securely from integrated systems. Allow customers to quickly navigate to key actions like account management, applications, and service requests.

title: Account Opening and Service Modification Workflows
summary: Implement seamless workflows for opening accounts and modifying existing services.
description: Create user-friendly workflows to guide customers through submitting new account requests or modifying existing services. Ensure minimal input requirements and validation at each step. Automate request submission to back-end systems, integrating with workflow engines and ensuring compliance with internal approval processes.

title: Application Draft Saving and Document Upload
summary: Allow customers to save incomplete applications and upload required documents.
description: Enable customers to save ongoing account or service modification applications and resume them later. Implement secure document upload functionality supporting multiple file formats. Ensure uploaded documents are encrypted and linked to the corresponding application records while maintaining compliance with document retention policies.

title: Real-Time Notifications and Status Updates
summary: Implement notification system for status updates and email alerts.
description: Develop a notification framework that provides real-time status updates on submitted applications and service requests. Integrate with email systems to send notifications for request receipts, approvals, or required actions. Configure push notifications within the portal for immediate user feedback on workflow updates.

title: Interaction and Transaction History Management
summary: Maintain comprehensive history of customer interactions and transactions.
description: Implement functionality to record and display a detailed history of customer activities, such as account openings, modifications, and document uploads. Provide users with easy access to this history for transparency and auditability. Ensure that historical data is securely stored and complies with data retention policies.

title: Core Banking System Integration
summary: Ensure seamless integration with bank's existing core banking systems.
description: Develop integration modules and APIs to connect the self-service portal with the bankâ€™s core banking system. Facilitate data synchronization, real-time status retrieval, and secure transaction execution. Design integration for performance optimization, fault tolerance, and data consistency across systems.

title: Portal Data Management and Security
summary: Establish dedicated database and implement robust data security measures.
description: Set up a dedicated database for portal operations to ensure performance and reliability while maintaining data separation from core banking systems. Implement encryption at rest and in transit, regular backups, and access logging. Conduct periodic vulnerability assessments and ensure compliance with security standards.
